headline: Ask HN: Did anybody else notice the Vagina Washing the mods did?
description:
Maybe you enjoyed clicking on the thread under the original title, "Baz Lurmahnn's 'Wear Sunscreen' was the unexpected hit of the 90s" and seeing the personal reflections.

Then somebody mentioned the original author, Mary Schmich, and how it was her words being used.

Meanwhile she's credited on the track as main songwriter, but okay, sure, underdog story...

Then I see the title changes to something like "Mary Schmich's essay about growth spawned a song" and I just kind of blinked.

Every comment in the thread was based on the original title, and then because of a few "no-kidding-keep-digging-watson" commentidiots you Vagina Wash an otherwise neutral thing?

So, HN, did anybody else notice this or am I just missing cartilage?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 还有人注意到修改员所做的 "阴道清洗 "吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 還有人注意到修改員所做的 "陰道清洗 "嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
也许你喜欢点击原标题下的主题，"Baz Lurmahnn's 'Wear Sunscreen' was the unexpected hit of the 90s" and seeing the personal reflection.

然后有人提到原作者Mary Schmich，以及它是如何她的话被使用。

同时她在这首歌上被记为主要词曲作者，但好，当然，弱势的故事。

然后我看到标题变成了"Mary Schmich关于成长的文章催生了一首歌"，我只是有点眨眼。

线程中的每个评论都是基于原来的标题，然后因为几个"no-kidding-keep-digging-watson" commentidiots you Vagina Wash an otherwise neutral thing?

所以，HN，有没有其他人注意到这个，还是我只是缺少软骨？
description_zh-Hant:
也許你喜歡點擊原標題下的主題，"Baz Lurmahnn's 'Wear Sunscreen' was the unexpected hit of the 90s" and seeing the personal reflection.

然後有人提到原作者Mary Schmich，以及它是如何她的話被使用。

同時她在這首歌上被記為主要詞曲作者，但好，當然，弱勢的故事。

然後我看到標題變成了"Mary Schmich關於成長的文章催生了一首歌"，我只是有點眨眼。

線程中的每個評論都是基於原來的標題，然後因為幾個"no-kidding-keep-digging-watson" commentidiots you Vagina Wash an otherwise neutral thing?

所以，HN，有沒有其他人注意到這個，還是我只是缺少軟骨？
